service_alerts.subject: New Bare Metal Server Deployment Delays

entries.message:
We have received reports from customers regarding delays when creating new Bare Metal server deployments.

Our developers are aware of the issue and are working diligently to resolve this as quickly as possible.

This issue only impacts the creation of new Bare Metal deployments. Current deployments are unaffected.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Amsterdam location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-09-21 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-09-22 02:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Amsterdam instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Chicago location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-09-21 04:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-09-21 08:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Chicago instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Delhi NCR location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-09-22 20:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-09-23 24:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Delhi NCR instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
